 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנַן‎</span>] **verb denominative Pi\`el** ***Infinitive construct*** suffix with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַנְנִי ע‎</span> [[Gen.9.14|Gen 9:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***when I bring clouds***, etc. 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנַן‎</span>] **verb Po\`.** ==practice soothsaying== (probably denominative, but original meaning dubious; connection with I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָן‎</span> ([[BDB#De|De]]<sup>[[Isa.2.6|Isa 2:6]]</sup>) now generally abandoned; [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>ZMG xxxi (1877), 539</sup> compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיִן‎</span> ***eye***, so [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 148</sup> (but see below); [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>JPhil xiv (1885), 119 f.</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***nasal twang, hum of insects***, whence diviners as ***crooning***; [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>31 of diviner as</sup> interpreting ***hum*** of insects, ***whisper*** of leaves, etc.; [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Heid. 2, 204 now</sup> compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***appear***, i. e. ***dealers in phenomena***); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעוֺנֵן‎</span> [[2Kgs.21.6|2Kgs 21:6]] = [[2Chr.33.6|2Chr 33:6]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלֹא תְעוֺנֵ֑נוּ‎</span> [[Lev.19.26|Lev 19:26]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); ***Participle*** as substantive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעוֺנֵן‎</span> [[Deut.18.10|Deut 18:10]] (forbidden), plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֹנְנִים‎</span> v[[Deut.18.14|Deut 18:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעוֺ‎</span> [[Mic.5.11|Mic 5:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלוֺן מְעוֺנְנִים‎</span> [[Judg.9.37|Judg 9:37]] (see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלוֺן‎</span>; seat of an oracle, compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem i. 179 2nd ed. 196</sup>); also (without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְ‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 233</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 349</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹנְנִים‎</span> [[Isa.2.6|Isa 2:6]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹנְנֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Jer.27.9|Jer 27:9]] feminine singular in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹנְנָה‎</span> [[Isa.57.3|Isa 57:3]] ***sons of a soothsaying woman***, figurative of apostates. — see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּשֵּׁף‎</span>, II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָחַשׁ‎</span>], [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָסַם‎</span>]. 

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ענז‎</span> (√ of following; see Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענז‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֵז‎</span>).
